heading: HB00082
0: AN ACT AMENDING SECTIONS 9 AND 41 OF RA 8291, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE "GOVERNMENT SERVICE INSURANCE ACT OF 1997" BY DEFINING "BASIC MONTHLY PENSION" AND INCREASING THE MEMBERSHIP OF THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES OF THE GSIS
short-title: Amending Sections 9 And 41 Of Ra 8291, Otherwise Known As The "government Service Insurance Act Of 1997" By Defining "basic Monthly Pension" And Increasing The Membership Of The Board Of Trustees Of The Gsis
status: Pending with the Committee on GOVERNMENT ENTERPRISES AND PRIVATIZATION since 2019-07-23
